content: lovey bunny a pattern for a lovey blanket topper by smoll creepy legs materials and tools 100g light worsted weight 100% cotton yarn in white 100g light worsted weight 100% cotton yarn in an accent color 3 5 mm hook polyfill brown embroidery floss or thin yarn pink embroidery floss or thin yarn tapestry needle abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet increase decrease invisible decrease - repeat instructions in brackets given the number of times - stitch count notes this pattern uses only continuous rounds this pattern does not include instructions for the blanket you may sell any items you make from this pattern but you may not sell or reproduce the pattern itself head in white 1 magic_ring 6 stitches 6 2 increase 6 12 3 increase st x6 18 4 increase st 2 x6 24 5 increase st 3 x6 30 6 increase st 4 x6 36 7 increase st 5 x6 42 8 increase st 6 x6 48 9-16 st 48 48 17 decrease st 6 x6 42 18 decrease st 5 x6 36 19 decrease st 4 x6 30 20 decrease st 3 x6 24 stuff the head with polyfill 21 decrease st2 x6 18 22 decrease st x6 12 23 decrease 6 6 finish stuffing the head with polyfil and close the ball fasten_off leaving a long tail ears in white make two 1 magic_ring 6 stitches 6 2 increase 6 12 3 increase st x6 18 4 increase st 2 x6 24 5 increase st 3 x6 30 6 increase st 4 x6 36 7-26 st 36 36 27 decrease st 10 x3 33 28-29 st 33 33 30 decrease st 9 x3 30 31-32 st 30 30 33 decrease st 8 x3 27 34-35 st 27 27 36 decrease st 7 x3 24 37-38 st 24 24 39 decrease st 6 x3 21 40-41 st 21 21 42 decrease st 5 x3 18 43-49 st 18 18 fold in half and slip_stitch both sides together to close fasten_off leaving a long tail arms in white make two 1 magic_ring 6 stitches 6 2 increase 6 12 3 increase st x6 18 4 increase st 2 x6 24 5-12 st 24 24 13 decrease st 10 x2 22 14-15 st 22 22 16 decrease st 9 x2 20 17-18 st 20 20 19 decrease st 8 x2 18 20-24 st 18 18 fasten_off leaving a long tail stuff the arms very lightly bow in highlight color i used the free bow pattern from https //www lilleliis com/amigurumi-crochet-freebies/crochet-bow/ blanket make a 40 x 40 cm blanket of your choice block your blanket before assembling assembly pin and stitch the ears to the top of the head pin and stitch the blanket and arms to the bottom place and stitch the bow embroider the eyes and nose onto the head i recommend starting with the nose so that you have a central reference for the eyes
